total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the locations of the numbers 1, 3, 4, 6, and 7 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the number of rows and columns that are filled with 5s in the input grid.
Q3: Identify the pattern of the color change in the examples.
Q4: Apply the color change pattern to the input grid based on the locations of the numbers 1, 3, 4, 6, and 7.
Q5: Determine the new color for each row and column filled with 5s based on the color change pattern.
Q6: Replace the color of each row and column filled with 5s in the input grid with the new color determined in Q5.
